task.title: Translating the elements using the Translation tab

taskbody.context:
Most elements in Design Studio can be translated such as:
Attribute and enumerated value in the Domain Designer for local field extending application(s).
Labels for a screen and on its composing fields .
To create or edit a translation:

step.cmd: In the Editor area, click the element to translate.
In the Properties view pane, click the Translation tab.
In the Translation column, edit the existing text or type the translated text of the desired language.
step.info: If you do not see the language that you want in the Language column, see section Setting Language of Interest for more information about how to add the desired language.

step.cmd: To update the Translation column, click anywhere in the Editor area.

To save the translations, select
File Save
from the menu bar.
